official_title: Expressing the sense of the Congress relating to investigation of the medicare program and the high cost of durable medical equipment provided by certain health care suppliers.

summary.text: Calls for the continuation of the investigation into the Medicare program (title XVIII of the Social Security Act) and the high cost under the program of durable medical equipment provided by certain suppliers.

titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress relating to investigation of the medicare program and the high cost of durable medical equipment provided by certain health care suppliers.
